name: Blood Trail (itch) (Extroias, extroiergamer, Spidei)
description:
You're a vampire that's dying and you're trying to run from your own death. How long can you survive?

Esc - Pause

A,D - Move Left and Right

Space - Jump

E- Start Casting

After you start casting press W,A,S or D to perform Spells

W - Bat Transformation(Hold to continue as a bat while draining blood)(Obs: use mouse to make the bat go up and down)

A - Lightning Arc  (Creates multiple rays of lightning that damage the enemies around you)

S - Lightning Bolt  (Summons a lighting strike that hits the enemy in the position that your cursor is)

D - Blood Shot (Shots a bullet of blood in the direction that you are aiming your cursor)

When you flash red it means you can cast again!

Blood is represented by your trail, if it runs out(the trail catches you) you die!

Blood Constantly drains, but you can recover it by killing enemies.

Each spell costs an amount of blood, so be careful!
